text:
If mod_alias is loaded before mod_vhost_alias, ScriptAlias commands are ignored
and only the VirtualScriptAlias is set.  This is contrary to the mod_vhost_alias
documentation which says that ScriptAlias overrides VirtualScriptAlias.

Reversing the load order so that mod_vhost_alias comes before mod_alias causes
things to work correctly.
creator: jra@febo.com
nd@perlig.de
text:
Hmm, I can't find such a sentence in the 1.3 docs of mod_vhost_alias (but I may
have missed it), can you point me?

Anyway, in 1.3 there's the rule: don't change the module order unless you really
know, what you do. The 2.0 architecture is much better in those things.
